EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_EMA Analytics in the Cloud_Q116.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for downloading the Analytics in the Cloud report. We know you're likely considering all of the options available for turning data into transformational businesses value, and we appreciate the chance to show you our leading data solutions to do just that.
For more about analytics in the cloud and related topics that were discussed in the report, please visit:
Pivotal BDS: Open Source, Scale-out Data Management Portfolio <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite]]> Introducing Greenplum: Worldâ€™s First Open Source MPP Data Warehouse <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse]]> Apache HAWQ: The Way to Hadoop Native SQL <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/the-way-to-hadoop-native-sql]]> 2 Reasons Why In-Memory Data Grids Are A Must-Have For Apps at Scale <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/2-reasons-why-in-memory-data-grids-are-a-must-have-for-apps-at-scale]]>
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by serving as a trusted partner to enterprises building, evolving, scaling and adapting to the new realities of the digital economy. Contact us <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your Big Data analytics initiatives.
